mapper.select: /* com.neofect.gts.services.ho.repository.HO03060Repository.getScmList */ SELECT A.YYYYMM, A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DEPT_GONGCLOSEDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS DEPT_GONGCLOSEDATE, A.DEPT_GONGCLOSEYN, A.GONGCLOSEYN, TO_CHAR(A.DEPT_SERVICECLOSEDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS DEPT_SERVICECLOSEDATE, A.DEPT_SERVICECLOSEYN, A.SERVICECLOSEYN, TO_CHAR(A.DEPT_PAYCLOSEDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS DEPT_PAYCLOSEDATE, A.DEPT_PAYCLOSEYN, A.PAYCLOSEYN, TO_CHAR(A.DEPT_SPECIALCLOSEDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS DEPT_SPECIALCLOSEDATE, A.DEPT_SPECIALCLOSEYN, A.SPECIALCLOSEYN, TO_CHAR(A.DEPT_ACNTCLOSEDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS DEPT_ACNTCLOSEDATE, A.DEPT_ACNTCLOSEYN, A.ACNTCLOSEYN, TO_CHAR(A.DEPT_SELLCLOSEDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS DEPT_SELLCLOSEDATE, A.DEPT_SELLCLOSEYN, A.SELLCLOSEYN FROM CODE_CLOSING A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE A.YYYYMM = #{yymm} AND A.DEPT_ID LIKE #{dept} AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID ASC
